function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Integration of climatic, weather, environmental, and health data","Impact":"Potential for rapid identification of geographic areas of increased risk and high-risk populations","Mitigation":"Enhanced public health interventions and policies","Technologies":"Data integration and analysis tools","People":"Public health practitioners, policy makers, general public","Owner":"European Union and international agencies"},{"Description":"Dissemination of results to various stakeholders","Impact":"Informed decision-making and policy development","Mitigation":"Effective communication strategies and engagement with stakeholders","Technologies":"Data mapping and visualization tools","People":"Policy makers, public health practitioners, non-governmental organizations","Owner":"E3 Network"},{"Description":"Continuous assembly of data from various sources","Impact":"Enhanced analytical capacity and reference point for research","Mitigation":"Regular outputs from advanced scientific analysis","Technologies":"Data processing and analysis tools","People":"Researchers, public health practitioners","Owner":"E3 Network"}]}
